snippet: London Olympic champion Andy Murray reached the semi-finals of the men's tennis on Friday after winning a third-set tie-break to scrape through a testing encounter against American Steve Johnson....
lead_paragraph: London Olympic champion Andy Murray reached the semi-finals of the men's tennis on Friday after winning a third-set tie-break to scrape through a testing encounter against American Steve Johnson.

headline.print_headline: Murray, Nadal Both Squeak Into Semi-Finals
headline.main: Murray, Nadal Both Squeak Into Semi-Finals
